scripts.pack: bun run build && bunx web-ext build --overwrite-dest
scripts.sign:listed: bun run build && bunx web-ext sign --channel listed --amo-metadata ./amo-metadata.json --api-key "$AMO_API_KEY" --api-secret "$AMO_API_SECRET"
scripts.sign:unlisted: bun run build && bunx web-ext sign --channel unlisted --api-key "$AMO_API_KEY" --api-secret "$AMO_API_SECRET"
